preface.title: Preface
preface.p: By popular demand, I've added this Instructor's manual to the Applied Discrete Structures Project. The initial version is an edited copy of our original suggestions for coverage of material in the book together with a few exams.

Many of the concepts introduced in this text are illustrated using SageMath code. SageMath (sagemath.org) is a free, open source, software system for advanced mathematics. Sage can be used either on your own computer, a local server, or on SageMathCloud (https://cloud.sagemath.com).
